title: India: an Introduction
creator_credit: James MacDonald, Michael Camerini, Sam Bryan and Worldview Productions
brief_description: Shows India as a nation varied in cultures, religions and customs, in climate, dress, diet, history, and language. Looks at industries and farming. Animated maps are used to locate the Himalayas, farmlands, paths of the monsoon rains, population density and India’s many alphabets and languages.
